next_steps.note: "Define the scope of the network scanning project: What networks will be scanned (e.g., internal, external, specific subnets)? What information are we trying to gather (e.g., live hosts, open ports, OS detection, service versions)?",
"Research and select a network scanning tool. Consider options like Nmap, Masscan, or OpenVAS. Document the pros and cons of each relative to the project scope.",
"Establish a test environment. Set up a small, isolated network to test the chosen scanning tool and refine scan configurations before deploying to production networks.",

"Develop a basic scan configuration.  Start with a simple host discovery scan (e.g., ping sweep) and document the parameters used. Note: Ensure legal and ethical considerations are addressed before scanning any network.",
"Create a document outlining the project's goals, scope, chosen tools, and initial scan configuration. This will serve as the project's foundation and communication tool."
